Topic.Title: Is there to make a section/passge combine?

Posts.EditableText:
Is there to make a section/passge combine?

Ex: (for a quiz)

Responses: [[10 Million]], [[20 Million]], [[50 Million]], [[100 Million]]

[[10 Million]], [[20 Million]], [[50 Million]]:
Incorrect

[[100 Million]]:
Correct
Posts.HTML:
Is there to make a section/passge combine?

Ex: (for a quiz)

Responses: [[10 Million]], [[20 Million]], [[50 Million]], [[100 Million]]

[[10 Million]], [[20 Million]], [[50 Million]]:
Incorrect

[[100 Million]]:
Correct

Posts.EditableText:
I think rather than having 3 combined sections, it would just be easier to have 3 links pointing to the same section.
Something like this:
```
Responses: [[10 Million]](wronganswer), [[20 Million]](wronganswer), [[50 Million]](wronganswer), [[100 Million]]

[[wronganswer]]:
Incorrect

[[100 Million]]:
Correct
```
